1460430.name: Forgotten Soundscape Demo
1460430.description:
Go on an audio journey by mixing soundscape and music in a very simple way ! Delivered in High Quality Audio !

"{ Forgotten Soundscape } - Demo" is a solo project made during the containment period. It offers you to create your own relaxing audio atmosphere in one of the four worlds offered by the full version.

How does it works ? Sounds and musical tracks are represented by small 3D models arranged on floating islands. Move the elements on the green central island to hear them. They are then spatialized and mixed in real time according to their position.

Important Note : Put on your Headphones, your Headset or connect your mobile device to Bluetooth Speakers to get the most out of audio immersion.
